entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
